title: 1000 Wins
body: Just picked up 1000 normal wins, looking for some cool rioters to play with!

replies.body:
Plz help me. I don't wunt me memes b dreems.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o0u4M6vppCI

> [{quoted}](name=G  3,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=VE38KHih,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-16T02:57:52.811+0000)
>
> Plz help me. I don't wunt me memes b dreems.
> 
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=o0u4M6vppCI

RAINSLIGHT TO THE RESCUE! I'd be glad to play some league. :3
Is it **Rain's Light** or **Rain Slight**? Did the rain hurt your feeling?

> [{quoted}](name=ploki122,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=VE38KHih,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-16T14:15:49.108+0000)
>
> Is it **Rain's Light** or **Rain Slight**? Did the rain hurt your feeling?

It's whatever you want bb. :3
You shall henceforth be known as Sir **Rain Slight**... the sky will pay for what it did to you.
Gonna add and hope you're still down. If that's cool.

I'm totes still down for a game! That is, if you'll have me...

 http://imgur.com/FaWg7Yz

How bout a game around 3 (PST) today?

If anyone else wants to join as well, leave a comment below! ^^
So sad. I was snowboarding earlier. I might have to just catch you online because I play kinda sporadically. Thanks for the add back though!!
I'm down to play if you'll have me.
Cool I just added you in game.
Congrats! passed 1500 wins myself not too long ago (hit 1500 losses exactly today though).
Thanks man! And nobody has a perfect record, no point in dwelling over the losses.
I gots mah 1000 recently too. I'm no rioter, but I'd play some with you :)

Damn dude! I've been playing League casually since Season 1 and I've only played about 1000-1300 match, have about 600 normal wins or something abysmal like that. You deserve it! Looks like Rainslight is here to make your Dreams. Just want to to say something that I got in a fortune cookie. 

" Dreams are just dreams. A dream with a goal and a deadline is a plan. "
- Wise fortune cookie made in ye ol Brooklyn
Haha thanks for the reply man, that's a legit quote.
